H0.text: What Jewish banking family rose from the Frankfurt ghetto to become unthinkably wealthy. Warburg

H1.text: What Jewish banking family rose from the Frankfurt ghetto to become unthinkably wealthy. Oppenheim

H2.text: What Jewish banking family rose from the Frankfurt ghetto to become unthinkably wealthy. Speyer

H3.text: What Jewish banking family rose from the Frankfurt ghetto to become unthinkably wealthy. Rotshild

A4.text: The Rothschild family is a wealthy Ashkenazi Jewish noble banking family originally from Frankfurt, Germany.

A5.text: The family rose to prominence with Mayer Amschel Rothschild (1748â€“1812), who established his banking business in the 1760s.
